de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.query.knn

Interface KNNResult<D extends Distance<D>>

  • Type Parameters:
    D - Distance type
    All Superinterfaces:
    Collection<DistanceResultPair<D>>, Iterable<DistanceResultPair<D>>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    KNNList, KNNUtil.KNNSubList

    public interface KNNResult<D extends Distance<D>>
extends Collection<DistanceResultPair<D>>
    Interface for kNN results - List<> like.
